Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled benefits that we believe you would greatly appreciate. Considering its quality and features, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can purchase this product for $145. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the excellence firsthand. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $145. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $145
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
